House For Rent 1 Year+
$9,950 / Per Month
4 Beds
4 Baths
3,322 SqFt
PRIME SHERMAN OAKS LOCATION!!!
This beautiful two-story home with over 3,300 square feet of living space features 4 en-suite bedrooms and a sparkling pool / spa.
As you walk in through the double doors you are greeted by high ceilings and a stunning stairway leading up to the second floor.
The spacious formal Living Room offers a marble fireplace and is open to the formal Dining Room with beautiful wood floors.
There is one bedroom downstairs that can be an in-laws suite with a connecting bathroom.
The large eat-in Kitchen is the heart of the home with stainless steel appliances including double ovens, gas cooktop, refrigerator, granite countertops and ample cabinets.
The adjacent wet bar opens to the Family Room creating a great entertaining space that leads to the covered patio.
The large master en-suite features a fireplace, walk-in closet, separate bath and shower and a SAUNA wow your own retreat!
The 2 additional spacious secondary bedrooms both have their own bathrooms as well.
The Backyard is like an Oasis with a large covered patio, a heated pool /spa and fruit trees.
The two car garage has ample shelves for storage.
Walking distance to Ventura Blvd as well as many shops and restaurants.
Welcome Home!!!
(Owner Occupied Do Not Go Direct!)
